seg.quote: ...in the short span that man has been on earth.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
spans a period of time
, traja ves čas določenega obdobja.

seg.quote: At 79, Dame Flora can look back at a career spanning more than half a century.

sense.def:
The span of something
je celotna dolžina nečesa.

seg.quote: Some eagles have a wing span of one and a half metres.

sense.def:
Kadar most
spans a river or valley
, je zgrajen z enega brega reke na drugega ali z ene strani doline na drugo.

seg.quote: ...a long lake spanned by a high, arching iron bridge.
